name: Lemon8 Creator’s Notion Dashboard
description: Stay ahead of the social media game with this content creator's Notion dashboard. Exclusively for Lemon8 creators.This is the only tool a Lemon8 content creator will ever need to plan and manage your social media content! This customizable digital planner offers a user-friendly interface with a range of sections to help you stay on top of your game.This is perfect if you are:Looking for a centralized database to strategize, plan and schedule your content saving you loads of time. Looking to buil
features: Looking for a centralized database to strategize, plan and schedule your content saving you loads of time.; Looking to build consistency when it comes to posting content; Looking to track fundamental social media analytics; Content calendar: Plan and schedule your social media content months ahead with ease.; Analytics Tracker: Automated analytics tracker to keep tabs on your monthly KPIs and goals.; Content ideas section: Easy-to-fill templates to help with caption writing.; How do I use it?As long as you have a Notion account, all you have to do is download the page and hit duplicate at the top right of the template.; I don't have a paid account, does this still work?Yes! It works the same
